short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Mediaflare Chrome Extension allows users to view obfuscated media on YouTube as if any other video.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The lightweight Mediaflare extension allows you to consume rich protected content on YouTube without ever leaving the website.
